ActFinancial Administration Act
PrecisAppointment of KPMG LLP of Ottawa, Ontario, as auditor of PPP Canada Inc. for the fiscal year ending March 31, 2009; and appointment of the Auditor General of Canada as joint auditor of PPP Canada Inc. for the fiscal year ending March 31, 2009.
